Bruce McNeil (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị 13, afọ 1939 na New York City - rụọ ọnwa Mee 16, afọ 2019 na Washington, DC) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto nke ọma na gburugburu ebe obibi nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ foto nke edekọla ụzọ mmiri Washington, DC. Kemgbe ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ, foto gburugburu ebe obibi ya lekwasịrị anya karịsịa n'idepụta Osimiri Anacostia. The Washington Examiner na The Washington Post akpọwo ya Osimiri Man na Osimiri Washington Man. Ọ bụ onye nhazi nke Anacostia River School of Photography, "otu ìgwè ragtag nke ndị na-ese foto ọkara iri na abụọ bi ma ọ bụ na-arụ ọrụ na agbata obi ma na-etinye onwe ha n'ịgba egwu osimiri na gburugburu ya

Mc Neil bụbu onye na-ese foto, onye na-eme ka ọkụ na ụlọ gbara ọchịchịrị, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndị a na-etinye na McCord Museum na William Notman Photographic Archives, na onye enyemaka nke onye na-ede ihe na onye na'ese foto maka MacDonald Steward Foundation. E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Smithsonian Anacostia Community Museum, Sandy Spring Museum, Reginald F

Lewis Museum of Maryland African-American History & Culture, George Washington University Museum, Parish Gallery, Hill Center Galleries na Old Naval Hospital, na Anacostian Art Center. McNeil bụ onye natara East of the River Distinguished Artist Award n'afọ 2016, ọrụ ya dịkwa na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke obodo Washington, DC.
N'ịtụle foto McNeil na Honfleur Gallery nke obodo ahụ n'afọ 2012, onye edemede Washington Post kwuru na "ọrụ McNeil·s na-elekwasị anya na uto nke agbata obi site na iji foto nke Osimiri Anacostia
" N'ịtụleghachi otu ihe ngosi ahụ, onye na-enyocha nka nke Post gbakwunyere na "Bruce McNeilãs ːa River Divide ːa Tale of Two Cities, dịka ọmụmaatụ, bụ foto na-adọrọ mmasị nke ìhè na Anacostia
